name: Holeyban
description:
Holeyban is a puzzle game made for the "brackeysgamejam 2020.1" inspired by the more notorious japanese game "Sokoban".

Push the boxes until all the holes are filled to win the game!

Controls:

WASD/↑↓←→: Move the player

Space: reset current level

Song "Memories" from bensound.com

Sfx made from bfxr and 3d assets are from Synty Studio
